text: is a railway station operated by Shigaraki Kohgen Railway in Kōka, Shiga, Japan. It is the southwestern terminus of the Shigaraki Line. == Station overview == Shigaraki Station has two side platforms, and along with Kibukawa Station at the other end, are the only manned stations on the entire line. Directly outside of the station, there is 5.3 m tall statue of a bake-danuki, which is a well-known product of the area. The statue's clothes are changed depending on the season.
